text: Jelena Janković (born 28 February 1985 in Belgrade) is a professional tennis player from Serbia. She is a former world no.1 singles player.Jelena Janković's profile at WTA Retrieved 12 August 2018 Janković reached 2008 US Open finals where she lost to Serena Williams in straight sets.Defeat puts Jankovic bid on hold Retrieved 12 August 2018 ==Career statistics== ===Grand Slam finals=== ====Singles: 1 (0–1)==== Result Year Championship Surface Opponent Score Runner-up 2008 US Open Hard Serena
